title: Don’t Use A.I. to Cheat in School. It’s Better for Studying.
description: Generative A.I. tools can annotate long documents, make flashcards, and produce practice quizzes.

title: Is A.I. Poisoning Itself?, Billionaire Cage Fight and Cooking With ChatGPT
description: The missing ingredient in A.I. content might soon be human-generated content.
